game.name: The Jackbox Party Pack 3
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, Remote Play 휴대전화, Remote Play 태블릿, Remote Play TV, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The threequel to the party game phenomenon features the deadly quiz show Trivia Murder Party, the say-anything sequel Quiplash 2, the surprising survey game Guesspionage, the t-shirt slugfest Tee K.O., and the sneaky trickster game Fakin’ It.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The threequel to the party game phenomenon features the deadly quiz show Trivia Murder Party, the say-anything sequel Quiplash 2, the surprising survey game Guesspionage, the t-shirt slugfest Tee K.O., and the sneaky trickster game Fakin’ It.
